free_text.Learning outcomes: Understand the load-carrying mechanisms of various structural types used in construction.[br/]Understand the fundamental principles of equilibrium and of the design of structures.[br/]Apply the knowledge gained to understand, design and dimension real structures.
free_text.Content: [b]Forces[/b][br/]Types of forces.[br/]Line  of action.[br/][br/][b]Inner forces and materials[/b][br/]Tension and compression.[br/]Mechanical properties of materials.[br/]Bases of dimensioning.[br/][br/][b]Equilibrium[/b][br/]Equilibrium of forces in the plane and in 3D space.[br/][br/][b]Câbles[/b][br/]Cables with a single and several loads.[br/]Form-stability of cables.[br/][br/][b]Cable networks and membranes[/b][br/][br/][b]Arches[/b][br/]Ideal form of arches.[br/]Stability and the line of action of inner forces.[br/]Statically determinate and statically indeterminate arches.[br/][br/][b]Vaults[/b][br/][b]Domes[/b][br/][b]Shells[/b][br/][b]Arch-cables[/b][br/]Tied arch.[br/]Cable with a strut.
